fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Check if a player's fingerprints were found at a dead player's house each night.
- Check if a player has a criminal history each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If a player has killed another player in the past, they will have a criminal history.
- If a player visited a dead player on the night they died, they will leave their fingerprints at the dead player's house.
- You may not multitask
- While you are alive, all players will flip their actual role. Any abilities that affect what players flip upon death will be nullified.
